name: In Search Of Paradise (elvaq)
description:
I tried to make this top-down driving game in at least one Wizard Jam before this without completing... Time to pick up the old bones and make them dance a little more.

If you are stuck try looking at a map (Tab key) or pausing (Escape key) to look at controls. The pause screen also has some suggestions for activities but the intro and outro for the game are not complete yet.

Will keep building this over the next two weeks..!

enjoy,
